overview: Mike Sievert is a technology executive, investor, entrepreneur, and board director based in Seattle, WA. His executive appointments include roles as EVP/CMO at E*Trade Financial, EVP/CMO at AT&T Wireless, Corporate VP Global Windows Group at Microsoft, CEO at Switchbox Labs (sold to Lenovo Group, Inc.), and Chief Commercial Officer at Clearwire. He has served on boards of public companies Rogers Wireless (#2 Canadian Wireless Company), and Switch & Data, Inc. (datacenter company, sold to Equinix, Inc.), and a number of venture-backed private companies.
